articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Shubman Gill down with dengue ahead of India's World Cup opener vs Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Gill has tested positive for dengue and hence is most likely to miss the match at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India on Friday was handed a massive concern two days before their ICC World Cup 2023 opener against five-time champions Australia as in-form opener Shubman Gill has tested positive for dengue a… [+3345 chars]
